name: The Angel of Everything [text]
description:
This is the first in a series of poems written between March 2019 and March 2020, following two initial experiences with 5-MeO-DMT, after more than 15 years spent without exploring the format.

The poem was inspired by the simple experience of going outside to pee in the snow in the late winter at night, during a power outage in the Eastern Townships of Quebec.

Written in the Eastern Townships of Quebec in March 2019. Cover image photo take in the Eastern Townships of Quebec in March 2019.
